LanguageData.VFE_BrainWashedNotFully.label: major brainwash
LanguageData.VFE_BrainWashedNotFully.description: I got ejected abruptly in the middle of a conversion. I don't feel too great.

LanguageData.VFE_BrainWashedFully.description: My new beliefs are amazing, but the sudden conversion takes some time getting used to.
